title: San Luis and Delta-Mendota Water Authority: B.F. Sisk Dam Raise and Reservoir Expansion Project.
subject: BFSiskDamRaiseandReservoirExpansionProject
SanLuisandDelta-MendotaWaterAuthority

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law provides various sources of funding for water and transportation projects.

This bill would appropriate $455,500,000 from the General Fund to the San Luis and Delta-Mendota Water Authority for the purpose of funding the State Highway 152 Route improvements required to complete the B.F. Sisk Dam Raise and Reservoir Expansion Project.

actions.description: From printer. May be heard in committee March 17.

extras.impact_clause: An act relating to the San Luis and Delta-Mendota Water Authority, and making an appropriation therefor.
